short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to specify a background image and a city's weather for displaying it in every new tab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bored of plane new tabs? Get this extension and it will solve this! You can define color schemes as you'd like or maybe have dynamic images every time you open a new tab (based on some keyword you enter, i.e 'trees'). Also if you want to know how's the weather it can display the temperature and humidity. We will continue on adding features, the next big one is adding 3D animations!
